Nick's Blog

Radio Sock: Episode 1

29 November 2005

We've recorded our first podcast episode here at Socklabs and it is ready for the world. Tonight we discussed a lot of random stuff, the web, where it is going and what is going on. I don't claim that it is great or anything, but it is a start and will get better in time.

Radio Sock: Episode 1

This feed, http://blog.socklabs.com/feed, is the official podcast feed. To start listening just subscribe to this feed with itunes or the like and start listening.
